issue.title: Allow forks for abi checker jobs

content.raw:
I thought it before, and only problem with job parametrization vs different jobs is that sometimes we want to keep the semantics in the job name (imaging to parametrize the platform to build).

Thinking this case again, your are right, sounds like a much better solution.
